function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High concentration of suppliers or clients at a very granular product level","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases within the GVC","Mitigation":"Diversification of suppliers and clients, implementation of strict health and safety protocols","Technologies":"Supply chain management software, health monitoring technology","People":"Workers at the granular product level","Owner":"Supply chain managers, company management"},{"Description":"Amplification of volatility due to concentration in GVCs","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to contagious disease outbreaks and their economic impact","Mitigation":"Diversification of production and trade networks, implementation of risk management strategies","Technologies":"Simulation models, risk assessment software","People":"Economic analysts, risk managers","Owner":"Government agencies, corporate leadership"},{"Description":"Anticompetitive behaviors associated with concentration in GVCs","Impact":"Undermining of efficiency gains and potential disregard for health and safety regulations","Mitigation":"Enforcement of antitrust laws, promotion of fair competition, implementation of health and safety regulations","Technologies":"Data analytics, monitoring and enforcement tools","People":"Regulatory agencies, industry watchdogs","Owner":"Government regulators, industry associations"}]}
